## Some Abstract Data Viz

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)
```

```{r}
set.seed(23479)
n <- 25
tibble(
  x = runif(n),
  y = runif(n)
) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_voronoi_tile(aes(fill = y)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "A") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

